obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_65_0: * (Quit messing with your ears^1! We're about to be on!)/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_80_0: * Would everyone please give a warm welcome.../%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_301_0: * First up^1, prince-from-the-dark and three time accidental fluffiest pet contest winner!/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_378_0: * Next up^1, Kris's friend^1, monster maniac^1, and WHERE did you wreck those pants?/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_444_0: * Hey folks^1, looks like the censors ARE gonna kill me^1!\M1/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_461_0: * Only on THIS show because they weren't blue enough for "The Sblurfs".../%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_556_0: * Well^1, don't "Kri" until the ending^1, folks!/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_561_0: * "KRS"? I told you^1! No KuRSing or the censors will kill me!/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_578_0: \EY* Hahahahah^1, Kris^1, knew I could count on you!!/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_590_0: * Well^1, this is gonna get confusing^1, isn't it^1, folks!?/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_648_0: * AAA!? They're already SCREAMING from DELIGHT^1, folks!!!/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_702_0:
＊ いえ^1！　ワタクシ
　 ウソは　申しません！/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_707_0_b:
＊ なぜでしょう^1…
　 字面から　イラ立ちが
　 感じられる気が　いたします！/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_712_0:
＊ 「ソソソ」？
　 そんなにコソコソしないで
　 堂々としてください！！/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_717_0:
＊ 「アアア」に　したかったのかな^1？
　 …勇者は　みんな　その名前が
　 好きですねえ…^1　いいでしょう！/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_647_0: * Hey^1, hopefully someday you can learn how to spell your own name^1, too!\M1/%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_666_0: * Now that we've all been (im)properly introduced.../%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_703_0: * Today's "GAME" SHOW will be..^1. A VIRTUAL ADVENTURE through TV DESERT!/
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_704_0: * Each of you will use our CUTTING EDGE^1, PROPRIETARY CONTROLLER PADS.../
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_705_0: * To control FANTASY VERSIONS OF YOURSELF in a world so REAL^1, you'll forget IT'S NOT!/
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_706_0: * On your QUEST you will fight BATTLES..^1. quiz \O4..^1. gain POINTs.../
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_707_0: * And maybe learn to \O3 each other a little along the way./%
obj_ch3_GSA02_slash_Step_0_gml_746_0: * Now^1, don't TOUCH THAT DIAL^1, and don't STOP THOSE SMILES!^1! Because.../%
